resources.string:
A rendezvous for students to showcase their techn talent, Bharatiya Vidya
Bhavan’s Sardar Patel Institute of Technology (S.P.I.T.), Mumbai proudly launches its
technical fest, Matrix.
Being in our nascent stage, we aim to up the technical quotient of S.P.I.T. with our tagline, ’Wake Up
For You Are a Genius!’ urging every individual to invoke their latent talent and revel in the joys of
technology and innovation.
To make sure Matrix 2014 wishes to capture the interest of one and all, encompassing a range of technical as well as non technical events.
So this 26 - 27 September ,Matrix is the place to be.
